itemDescription: Scottish surgeon and retired hockey player

wikipedia_page.main: Abigail "Abi" Walker is a Scottish surgeon and retired international female field hockey goalkeeper. She made 65 appearances for the Women's National Team and won 17 caps for Great Britain.

link_mentions.page: 2017–18 Investec Women's Hockey Premier Division season
response: *Squad: Giselle Ansley, Georgie Twigg (Capt.), Jo Hunter, Hannah Martin, Emily Atkinson, Emily Defroand, Beckie Middleton, Hollie Pearne-Webb, Holly Payne, Alice Sharp, Abi Walker (GK). Subs: Sarah Page (7 mins), Robyn Collins (9), Olivia Chilton (14), Jenna Woolven (14), Anabel Herzsprung (20), Stephanie Addison (23), Ellie Shahbo (GK) (60)
